wargame.map

Class MapElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • wargame.map.MapElement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class MapElement
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class represent an element of the map: the ground, a tree, water spot, etc
    It also defines if we can cross it, shot through, etc.
    It's position and dimensions are defined by the image's dimensions and position.
    Author:
    Balthazar Pavot
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
